fulltext:
Résumé 
PERSONAL PROFILE  
Full name: Phan Thi To Nga 
Date of birth: 04/10/1993 
Current Address: Dong Da, Ha Noi 
Email: ngaptt0410@gmail.com  
     Tel: 0934.628.739 
Personal Living Philosophy: 
“If you believe very strongly in something, stand up and fight for it.”  
― Roy T. Bennett 
Career Objective: Senior Business Analysis/ Operation. 
EDUCATION 
_____________________ 
Diplomatic Academy of Vietnam (DAV) – International Economics (IE) 
2011- 2015 
• 
Degree Level: Good  
• 
Relevant Coursework: Basic Economics (Micro/Macro Economics), Integrated Economics Development, External Economic, 
Commerce, Leadership/Logical Thinking Course. 
WORK EXPERIENCE   
v The S One Consult Company (Smart Solutions Make Great Impact)         
Since June/2018                                                                                                 
Associate/ Senior Project Manager 
o 
Kim An Financial Consulting Group 
Being responsible as a Head of Risk Management (with 1 mentor) for 1 month to reach KPI, specifically, 10B of disbursement 
amount tageted for vendors. 
Build a “Department of Concentrated Operation” to manage all the operation activities by creating the Report System (level 
by level, daily KPI reports), Tasklist System for Teamlead & Staffs (rearrangement to enhance the system’s performance). 
Optimize internal & external coordination process with banks/finiancial instutions to raise disbursement rates and amounts 
o 
Biotri, The Bank, Semtop Viet 
Being in charge of building the business proposal for Biotri/ The Bank/ Semtop to get the next development phase (testing 
phase, interim state) 
o 
TOPICA Native (HN & HCMC), Semtop Viet 
Consult & Implement the whole recruitment process for Sales Department of TOPICA Native & Semtop Viet: Identify the 
Target Candidates’ Potraits, Build Candidate Pool & Implement Convert Process. 
Manage a Convert Team (7 people) to reach the Recruitment KPI: 40 Telesales within 2 weeks & 15 Media Consultants within 
2 weeks. 
New staffs from the Recruitment project gets the outstanding achievement: Reach over 2 Billion dong Revenue at the 1st 
performance month. 
v TOPICA Edtech Group  
Nov 2016 – June 2018 
Project Manager  
o 
TOPICA Native Thailand – HR Department (Manager) 
Build the HR Department in Thailand market (focusing on Recruitment team). 
Work closely with Thai local trainers/staffs to operating every activities in HR Department & help them perform well by 
adapting the Recruitment plan of all departments in Native Thai (around 50-70 new staffs/ month). 
Create the Mechanism and Scheme for team to motivate and take the possible pressure on working performance. 
Successfully promote and handover to 1 local trainer to become Recruitment manager.  
o 
TOPICA Native Thailand – Sales Department (Development Projects) 
Explore the new alternative channels for Sales to increase the competitive ability in Thai market 
Make a plan and implement the new channel B2B Sales in Thai Market 
Work closely with Thai local Sales staffs to do some development project to optimize the Conversion Rate, Process. 
o 
TOPICA Edumall – Teacher Management & Product Quality Department (Development Projects) 
Build the initial Branding Points/ Content Storage (USP – Unique Selling Points/ Hooks) for long-term use in Marketing 
materials, which contribute into the attractive content package to recruit Teachers for Edumall Thailand. 
Find the key metrics of Customer Behaviors to evaluate the effectiveness of every online courses on Edumall. 
Build the framework to evaluate the quality of every courses in Edumall for teachers.  
v VNP Group – Vatgia.com  
Dec 2014 – Dec 2015 
Product Development (PD) 
Product R&D of Product Development team (Level: PD – Product Design) for Vatgia.com 
Analyze the users data reports of each actions (hover, click, make payment, etc.) to optimize the users’ flow on website and 
increase the Conversion Rate. 
Propose new features including wireframes with navigations, UX/UI and layouts,etc. 
Compose requirement specifications for each features for other departments to do 
Manage every steps in whole process with other departments to make sure all functions will be updated and tracked easily. 
LEADERSHIP & ACTIVITIES________________________________________________________________________ 
IE Faculty Batch 38: Diplomatic Academy of Vietnam - Secretary  
 Oct 2011- Jun 2015 
• 
Secretary of International Economics Faculty Batch 38 
• 
Managed and coordinated all university’s public events and meetings (K38 Leaders, EFE Night, Evil Night Party, Miss 
DAV,etc.) 
• 
Awarded two “Certificate of Appreciation” from Youth Union (in different years) 
Awards from Academic Competitions  
 June 2013 - Sep 2016   
• 
The Winner of “Amazing UX 2016” (a competition for Technology & Product Development Community) 
• 
The Winner of “Nha truyen thong tai ba – IC Master 2014” (a competition specialized on PR knowledge) 
• 
The Runner – up of “Ban linh Marketers 2013” (organized by Marketing Club – Foreign Trade University) 
• 
TOP 9 Semi-final of “Young Marketers 2014” (organized by Redder Advertising) 
SKILLS, ACTIVITIES & INTERESTS__________________________________________________________________ 
Skills: Planning, Writing, Supervising, Training, Communication. 
Technical Skills: Confident with Microsoft Office, PowerPoint. Good at Google Spreadsheet/Excel. 
Interests: Mindfulness & relaxing activities (Meditation, Relaxing with garden, Coffee time, Music).  
REFERENCES____________________________________________________________________________________ 
- 
Phung Tran Nguyet Anh – TOPICA Native Director (Sales, MKT & HR Center)/ Founder of The S One 
nguyetanh.erc@gmail.com 
- 
Nguyễn Thị Minh Hiền – Product Development Manager – VNP Group 
nguyenminhhien.pm@gmail.com (Direct Manager)

educations.major_categories: Khoa học xã hội và hành vi
